Negligible Tax (20% with indexation benefit) post 3 years.</div><h3 class="heading16 otherDiva">Scheme Information Document(SID)</h3><div class="para15"><a href="https://www.franklintempletonindia.com/investor/resources" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Click here</a></div><div style="margin-top: 32px; font-size: 14px;"><h3 class="heading16 otherDiva">Other plans of Franklin India Low Duration Fund</h3><div class="margin10"><a href="/mutual-funds/franklin-india-low-duration-fund-growth">Franklin India Low Duration Fund - Regular - Growth</a></div><div class="margin10"><a href="/mutual-funds/franklin-india-low-duration-fund-monthly-dividend">Franklin India Low Duration Fund - Regular - Monthly Dividend</a></div><div class="margin10"><a href="/mutual-funds/franklin-india-low-duration-fund-quarterly-dividend">Franklin India Low Duration Fund - Regular - Quarterly Dividend</a></div><div class="margin10"><a href="/mutual-funds/franklin-india-low-duration-fund-direct-mthly-dividend">Franklin India Low Duration Fund - Direct - Monthly Dividend</a></div><div class="margin10"><a href="/mutual-funds/franklin-india-low-duration-fund-direct-qtly-dividend">Franklin India Low Duration Fund - Direct - Quarterly Dividend</a></div><div class="margin10"><a href="/mutual-funds/franklin-india-low-duration-fund-direct-growth">Franklin India Low Duration Fund</a></div></div><div class="col l12" style="margin-top: -10px;"><div class="col l6"><div class="heading16 otherDiva">₹10000</div><div class="para15"><b>Min for First Investment</b></div></div><div class="col l6"><div class="heading16 otherDiva">0.42%</div><div class="para15"><b>Expense Ratio</b></div></div></div><div class="col l12"><div class="col l6"><div class="heading16 otherDiva">₹1000</div><div class="para15"><b>Min for Second Investment</b></div></div><div class="col l6"><div class="heading16 otherDiva">₹500</div><div class="para15"><b>Min SIP Amount</b></div></div></div><a href="/mutual-funds/amc/franklin-templeton-mutual-funds"><div class="col l12 valign-wrapper" style="margin-top: 30px; border-top: 1px solid rgb(228, 228, 228); border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(228, 228, 228);"><div style="margin: 12px 30px 12px 5px;"><div class="lazyload-placeholder" style="height: 80px;"></div></div><div class="para15"><div class="heading16">Franklin Templeton Mutual Fund</div><div style="margin-top: 10px;">Asset Management Company</div></div></div></a><div class="col l12" style="margin-top: 5px;"><div class="heading16 otherDiva">Santosh Kamath, Kunal Agrawal</div><div class="para15"><b>Fund Manager</b></div></div><div class="col l12"><div class="heading16 otherDiva">If redeemed bet. 0 Months to 3 Months;  Exit Load is 0.5%;</div><div class="para15"><b>Exit Load</b></div></div></div></div></div><div class="col l12 divSections"><div id="amcExtraDetailsSection"><h2 class="componentsMainHeading" style="margin-bottom: 15px;">About Franklin Templeton Mutual Fund</h2><div class="col l12"><p>Franklin Templeton Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 19/02/1996 and its managing total assets of ₹95,716 Cr. Its ranked at 8 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.</p><div><p>The firm specializes in conservatively managed mutual funds. It offers products under the Franklin,
Templeton, Mutual Series and Fiduciary brand names. Like other large investment companies, the
firm offers a wide variety of funds but is traditionally best known for bond funds under the Franklin
brand, international funds under the Templeton brand, and value funds under the Mutual Series
brand.</p>
<p>With more than 600 investment professionals in 28 countries around the world, Franklin Templeton
is uniquely positioned to look beyond the largest or most visible securities in each market to spot
smart global investments that meet their rigorous investment criteria.</p>
<p>Franklin Templeton's association with India dates back to over 2 decades as an investor. As part of
the group's major thrust on investing in markets around the world, the India office was set up in
1996 as Templeton Asset Management India Pvt. Limited.</p></div><div style="margin-top: 50px;"><table><tbody><tr><th>Launch Date</th><td>19 Feb 1996</td></tr><tr><th>Address</th><td>Indiabulls Finance Centre; Tower 2, 12th and 13th Floor; Senapati Bapat Marg; Elphinstone Road (W) Mumbai 400013</td></tr><tr><th>Assets</th><td>₹95,716 Cr</td></tr><tr><th>Sponsor</th><td>NA</td></tr><tr><th>Phone</th><td>022 - 67519100</td></tr><tr><th>Email</th><td>services@franklintempleton.com</td></tr></tbody></table></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="col l12 stickyBox"><div class="col l12 center-align" itemscope="true" itemtype="http://data-vocabulary.org/Review"><h2 class="heading18 mfS2" itemprop="itemreviewed">Franklin India Low Duration Fund - Direct - Growth</h2><span itemprop="rating" style="display: none;">5</span><span itemprop="reviewer" style="display: none;">Groww</span></div><div class="col l12 center-align"><div class="para15" style="margin-top: 30px;">1 Year Returns</div><div class="heading18" style="font-size: 32px; color: white; position: relative; top: 8px; left: 9px;">keyboard_arrow_right</i></div></div><div id="smScroll" class="smMainScrollDiv"><div class="col l3"><a id="mfCard" href="/mutual-funds/l-t-short-term-i-come-fund-direct-growth"><span><div class=""><div class="mfc1Div"><div class="mfc1DivSec"><div class="heading15">8.7%</div><div class="para12">3Y Returns</div></div><div class="mfc1ImgDiv"><div class="valign-wrapper mfc1Top"><div style="margin-right: 15px;"><img class="" src="https://groww.in/images/partners/lnt_groww.svg" width="40" height="40" alt="L&amp;T Mutual Fund" /></div><div class="heading13 mfc1HeadingHelp">L&amp;T Low Duration Fund - Direct - Growth</div></div></div><div class="valign-wrapper mfc1Mar"><div class="tagDiv" style="margin-right: 10px;">Debt</div><div class="tagDiv truncate" style="margin-right: 10px;">Low Duration</div><div class="tagDiv"><span class="mfc1RatIcon">2.0</span><i class="material-icons mfc1Star">star</i></div></div><div style="font-size: 12px;           <script type="text/javascript" async="" defer="">
            function downloadJSAtOnload() {
              (function(w,d,s,l,i){
                w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
                new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&amp;l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
                'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
                })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-T7VTWPR');
            }
            if (window.addEventListener)
              window.addEventListener("load", downloadJSAtOnload, false);
            else if (window.attachEvent)
              window.attachEvent("onload", downloadJSAtOnload);
            else window.onload = downloadJSAtOnload;
          </script>
